page.title: 03TRAFFIC AROUND OUR AREA
page.content: The majority of the traffic recorded went along the{B3179}towards{Budleigh {Salterton}.This means that this is a popular route across the common. Quite a few Heavy Goods Vehicles were using the B roads,they were probably going to the{ECC quarry at {Blackhill}or to{Exmouth Docks.}Some of them were from smaller companies in this area (e.g. bakery and building merchants). The majority of the traffic recorded were private cars (84% of all traffic) Of which over half carried only one person.This shows that they were probably shoppers or sales representatives. Generally we were surprised at the traffic passing through{Woodbury}on the B roads at this time in the afternoon.
